Player History
Drafted in 17th round, 267th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $714,286 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2016, off Patricia Schmidt (SEA)...
Injured on 4/11/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/17/2016 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,440,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/20/2017 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 7 weeks...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,440,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/6/2018 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Traded from Kansas City to St. Louis (B) on 7/30/2018 (Going to KC: 1B Bernie Orta. Going to SLB: C Ryan Balderrama)...
Injured on 8/5/2018 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,440,000 through salary arbitration...
